description: Closed walks of length n along the edges of a pentagon based at a vertex.
comments: In general a(n,m)=2^n/m*Sum(k,0,m-1,Cos(2Pi*k/m)^n) counts closed walks of length n at a vertex of the cyclic graph on m nodes C_m. Here we have the case m=5. - _Herbert Kociemba_, May 31 2004
formula: G.f.: -1/5*1/(2*x-1)-2/5*(2+x)/(x^2-x-1). a(n)=( 2^n + 2*(-1)^n*( F(n) + F(n-2) ) )/5, for n>1, where F(n) is the n-th Fibonacci number (cf. A000045)a(n)=2^n/5*Sum(k, 0, 4, Cos(2Pi*k/5)^n) - _Herbert Kociemba_, May 31 2004Recurrence: a(n)=5(a(n-2)-a(n-4)) + 2a(n-5) - _Herbert Kociemba_, Jun 04 2004
author: Paolo Dominici (pl.dm(AT)libero.it), May 23 2000
